card.name: Great Day, Great Hour
card.text: If an opponent plays a minion, exert a Dwarf who is damage +X to exert that minion X times.

card.name: ·Memories of Darkness
card.text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each time you lose initiative (except during the fellowship phase), you may play a {Dwarven} condition from hand or from your discard pile.

card.name: More Yet to Come
card.text: If a Dwarf kills a minion in a skirmish and that minion did not take all wounds caused by that Dwarf's damage bonus, assign those remaining wounds to minions not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: ·Aegnor, Elven Escort
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Aegnor to make a minion skirmishing an unbound {Elven} companion strength -1 for each archer you spot.

card.name: ·Arwen, Echo of Lúthien
card.text: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to discard the bottom card of your draw deck. If the bottom card was an {Elven} card, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.

card.name: ·Arwen, Queen of Elves and Men
card.text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2 for each wounded minion you can spot.

card.name: ·Celeborn, Lord of the Galadhrim
card.text: At the start of each skirmish involving Celeborn, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, you may discard it to wound each minion in that skirmish.

card.name: ·Círdan, The Shipwright
card.text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Skirmish: Exert Círdan to make a minion he is skirmishing strength -1 for each {Elven} event in your discard pile.

card.name: ·Elrond, Venerable Lord
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of each skirmish involving Elrond, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, you may heal another Elf.

card.name: Fleet-footed
card.text: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2. Spot a site in a support area to place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.name: ·Galadriel, Lady Redeemed
card.text: When Galadriel is in your starting fellowship, her twilight cost is -3. Fellowship or Regroup: Discard an {Elven} event from hand to discard a Shadow condition or Shadow possession.

card.name: ·Glimpse of Fate
card.text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Each time you lose initiative, make a minion strength -4 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Phial of Galadriel, Star-glass
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Skirmish: Until the regroup phase, remove the game text (except card type and race) from a minion skirmishing bearer and make it unable to gain game text. Discard this artifact.

card.name: Borne Far Away
card.text: Spot your Wizard to exchange a companion in hand with a companion in your dead pile or discard pile.

card.name: ·Brooding on Tomorrow
card.text: Each time you lose initiative (except during the fellowship phase), you may spot a {Gandalf} companion to choose an opponent who must discard one of his or her conditions.

card.name: Gathering Wind
card.text: Exert your Wizard and choose a number. Make each minion with that twilight cost strength -2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Out of the High Airs
card.text: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert your Wizard to discard each minion.

card.name: ·Treebeard, Keeper of the Watchwood
card.text: To play, spot 3 {Gandalf} companions. Regroup: Exert Treebeard twice to play a {Gandalf} condition from your discard pile and make an opponent discard one of his or her conditions.

card.name: A Dark Shape Sprang
card.text: If an opponent plays a possession on a companion, play Gollum at twilight cost -2 from your discard pile or hand to suspend the current phase. Begin a skirmish phase involving Gollum and that companion. When it ends, resume the suspended phase.

card.name: Final Strike
card.text: Any site 9 is a Mountain. Shadow: If the fellowship is at any site 9, play Gollum from your discard pile. Response: If the Free Peoples player uses a maneuver or archery special ability, exert Gollum to cancel its effect.

card.name: ·Gollum, Mad Thing
card.text: To assign Gollum to a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must make Gollum strength +3 until the regroup phase or add a burden.

card.name: Reclaim the Precious
card.text: Assignment: Assign Gollum to a companion bearing an artifact. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to prevent this and assign Gollum. Regroup: Exert Gollum twice to discard a possession. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Shelob, Her Ladyship
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. When you play Shelob, if you can spot Gollum, you may spot a companion. That companion cannot be assigned to a skirmish until the end of the turn.

card.name: ·Unabated in Malice
card.text: While you have initiative, each {Gollum} minion is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Gollum} minion strength +1 for each culture you can spot.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Elessar Telcontar
card.text: When you play Aragorn, you may heal another companion. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may exert a companion of one culture to heal a companion of another culture.

card.name: ·Cursed of Erech
card.text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. When you play Cursed of Erech, exert him twice. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert another {Gondor} Wraith to make Cursed of Erech defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Dead Man of Dunharrow
card.text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. When you play this companion, exert him twice.

card.name: ·Denethor, Lord of Minas Tirith
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Gondor} Men. Fellowship: If at a sanctuary, exert Denethor to take a {Gondor} card into hand from your draw deck, then reshuffle. Choose an opponent who may draw 2 cards.

card.name: Drawing His Eye
card.text: For each {Gondor} companion you spot, reveal 1 card at random from a Shadow player's hand. Choose a revealed Shadow card to be discarded, then its owner draws a card.

card.name: End of the Game
card.text: Make an exhausted {Gondor} companion strength +2. If that companion wins this skirmish, heal that companion or make him or her damage +1.

card.name: Every Little is a Gain
card.text: Spot a {Gondor} Man to discard a stacked Shadow card or to wound a minion bearing a fortification.

card.name: Fifth Level
card.text: Fortification. Bearer is strength -1 for each Fortification you can spot. Maneuver: Exert 2 {Gondor} Men or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition to a minion.

card.name: ·Hardy Garrison
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Gondor} Men. Each time you lose initiative, you may wound a minion.

card.name: Last Throw
card.text: If no opponent controls a site, spot 2 {Gondor} Men to make the move limit +1 for this turn.

card.name: Suffered Much Loss
card.text: Each site on the adventure path is a battleground. While you have initiative, each Uruk-Hai is strength +1.

card.name: Cast Unto the Winds
card.text: Regroup: Spot a Southron, remove a threat, and remove {3} to wound an unbound companion.

card.name: Corsair Boatswain
card.text: Corsair. To play, spot a {Raider} Man. Shadow: Exert this minion to play a {Raider} support area possession from your draw deck.

card.name: Corsair Brute
card.text: Corsair. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove a {Raider} token to wound a companion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Corsair Ruffian
card.text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may spot another corsair and discard the top card of the Free Peoples player's draw deck to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Easterling Berserker
card.text: Easterling. To play, spot an Easterling. While this minion is unwounded, he is damage +2. Skirmish: Wound 2 other {Raider} Men to heal this minion.

card.name: ·Easterling Pillager
card.text: Easterling. Fierce. When you play this minion, you may spot another Easterling to add a burden for each companion you spot over 5.

card.name: Far Harad Mercenaries
card.text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may spot 6 companions and another {Raider} Man to discard an unbound companion this minion is skirmishing.

card.name: Field of the Fallen
card.text: To play, spot a {Raider} Man. While there is a character in the dead pile, each companion of the same culture as that character is strength -1. Skirmish: Exert your Southron to make him strength +1.

card.name: High Vantage
card.text: Until the end of the assignment phase, each time a Southron is about to take a wound, prevent that.

card.name: Mûmak Chieftain
card.text: Southron. When you play this minion, you may play a mount on him from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Quelled
card.text: Exert a {Raider} Man to discard a Free Peoples condition. If you spot a {Rohan} Man, discard an additional Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Rallying Call
card.text: To play, spot a {Raider} Man. Threats cannot be removed by Free Peoples cards. Shadow: Remove {1} and play a Southron to add a threat.

card.name: Seasoned Leader
card.text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is enduring. Skirmish: Remove a threat to play a {Raider} condition from your discard pile.

card.name: Southron Fanatic
card.text: Southron. Each time a Man is assigned to skirmish this minion, wound that Man.

card.name: Southron Savage
card.text: Southron. While the total number of other minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.name: Stampeded
card.text: If a Free Peoples possession is played, spot a {Raider} card to discard that possession. If that possession was a {Gondor} or {Rohan} possession, wound an unbound Man.

card.name: ·Under Foot
card.text: Shadow: If you have initiative, spot a {Raider} Man and discard this condition to reconcile your hand. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Raider} Man strength +2.

card.name: Black Marshal
card.text: Shadow: Exert a Nazgûl and play a {Ringwraith} minion to add {1} (or {2} if you have initiative).

card.name: Cirith Ungol Scavenger
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert it to discard a possession borne by a character this minion is skirmishing.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Soldier
card.text: Shadow: Spot a possession to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Warrior
card.text: Shadow: Spot a possession to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Watchman
card.text: Each companion skirmishing this minion loses all damage and strength bonuses from possessions.

card.name: Dark Swooping Shadows
card.text: Heal an enduring {Ringwraith} minion to add a burden or 2 threats.

card.name: ·Gorbag, Covetous Captain
card.text: For each wound on the Ring-bearer, each {Ringwraith} Orc is strength +1.

card.name: ·Gorbag's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be a {Ringwraith} Orc. When you play this possession, you may discard a possession. Its owner may place it on top of his or her draw deck instead. If bearer is Gorbag, he is fierce.

card.name: Houses of Lamentation
card.text: Make a {Ringwraith} minion strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a companion of the same culture as a card in the dead pile).

card.name: Morgul Banner-bearer
card.text: While the total number of other minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, this minion is strength +3 and an archer.

card.name: ·Morgul Vanguard
card.text: Assignment: Assign this minion to an unbound companion bearing a hand weapon.

card.name: ·Stooping to the Kill
card.text: While you have initiative, each of your {Ringwraith} minions is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Ringwraith} minion strength +2.

card.name: Swarming Like Beetles
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a {Ringwraith} Orc and remove a threat to wound an unwounded companion.

card.name: Ten Times Outnumbered
card.text: Make a {Ringwraith} Orc strength +2 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.name: ·Úlairë Cantëa, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Úlairë Cantëa during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Úlairë Cantëa to discard a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Úlairë Enquëa, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Shadow cards cannot exert Úlairë Enquëa during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: If Úlairë Enquëa is skirmishing, heal him to add a burden.

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Úlairë Lemenya during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Úlairë Lemenya to wound up to 3 other {Ringwraith} minions.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Úlairë Nelya during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Úlairë Nelya to add {1} for each burden.

card.name: ·Úlairë Toldëa, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Shadow cards cannot exert Úlairë Toldëa during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Úlairë Toldëa to make him damage +1.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Lady of Ithilien
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Éowyn to choose an opponent. That opponent must wound a minion for each wound on each minion skirmishing Éowyn.

card.name: ·Fell Deeds Awake
card.text: To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Each time you lose initiative, you may liberate a site.

card.name: Unyielding
card.text: If your {Rohan} Man wins a skirmish, discard a {Rohan} possession to wound a minion or to liberate a site.

card.name: ·Advance Captain
card.text: Each roaming {Sauron} minion is damage +1.

card.name: Advance Marauder
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a roaming {Sauron} minion strength +3.

card.name: Advance Regular
card.text: Each roaming {Sauron} minion is fierce.

card.name: Advance Scout
card.text: Shadow: Exert or discard this minion to make each {Sauron} minion you spot roaming until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Barren Land
card.text: To play, spot a {Sauron} minion. Each time the fellowship moves to any site 8 or 9, exert each Ring-bound companion. Shadow: Discard this condition to play a {Sauron} minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Beaten Back
card.text: Make a {Sauron} minion strength +2 for each site you control. If you have initiative, that minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Guard
card.text: Damage +1.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Patroller
card.text: Damage +1. While you can spot 3 possessions, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Sentinel
card.text: Damage +1. If you can spot another {Sauron} Uruk-hai, this minion is twilight cost -1 for each possession you can spot.

card.name: Cirith Ungol Sentry
card.text: Damage +1.

card.name: ·Flames Within
card.text: While you have initiative, each of your {Sauron} minions is strength +2. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Sauron} minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is roaming).

card.name: Gorgoroth Keeper
card.text: Besieger. While you control a site, this minion's twilight cost is -2. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control.

card.name: Gorgoroth Swarm
card.text: Besieger. When you play this minion, you may spot 6 companions and another besieger to play a besieger from your discard pile and control a site.

card.name: ·Gothmog, Lieutenant of Morgul
card.text: Besieger. When you play Gothmog, the Free Peoples player must wound a companion for each site you control. While you control a site, Gothmog is fierce.

card.name: ·Gothmog's Warg
card.text: Bearer must be a {Sauron} Orc. For each site you control, bearer is strength +1 (or +2 if bearer is Gothmog).

card.name: Mordor Brute
card.text: Each {Sauron} Orc bearing a possession cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.name: Mordor Fiend
card.text: Shadow: If you cannot spot another minion and there are 3 or fewer twilight tokens, add {3} (or {5} if this minion is roaming).

card.name: Mordor Pillager
card.text: Besieger. Fierce. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot another {Sauron} minion to control a site. If you cannot spot 3 Free Peoples cultures, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

card.name: Mordor Wretch
card.text: Shadow: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and exert another {Sauron} minion twice to add {3} and draw a card.

card.name: Orc Ravager
card.text: To play, spot a {Sauron} minion. Shadow: Remove 2 threats to discard a condition.

card.name: Orc Slaughterer
card.text: Enduring. For each wound on this minion, it is strength +2.

card.name: ·Rank and File
card.text: Each time a roaming {Sauron} minion takes a wound, you may add a {Sauron} token here. Regroup: Exert an Uruk-hai or discard a {Sauron} minion to add a {Sauron} token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 {Sauron} tokens from here to make a {Sauron} minion strength +2.

card.name: The Ring is Mine!
card.text: If a burden is added, spot a {Sauron} minion to add an additional burden.

card.name: Ruinous Hail
card.text: If the Free Peoples player plays a possession, discard a {Sauron} minion from hand to prevent him or her from playing any more cards until the end of this phase.

card.name: ·Shagrat, Captain of Cirith Ungol
card.text: Damage +1. Each time Shagrat loses a skirmish, you may exert a character.

card.name: Speak No More to Me
card.text: Exert a {Sauron} minion to return a Free Peoples condition to its owner's hand (or 2 if both are {Shire} conditions).

card.name: Troll of Cirith Gorgor
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a {Sauron} minion. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you can spot.

card.name: Uruk Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Sauron} Minion. If bearer is an Uruk-hai, it is strength +2.

card.name: Window of the Eye
card.text: To play, spot a {Sauron} minion. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may remove a threat to wound an unbound companion.

card.name: Birthday Present
card.text: Fellowship: Add a burden to choose 2 {Shire} events with different card titles from your discard pile. Choose an opponent and make him or her choose 1 of those cards for you to take into hand.

card.name: Brave and Loyal
card.text: If a Hobbit companion is not assigned to a skirmish, exert that Hobbit to have him or her replace a companion (except the Ring-bearer) in a skirmish.

card.name: Chance Observation
card.text: If there are 4 or more {Shire} cards in your discard pile, make a Hobbit strength +1 for each Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: Great Heart
card.text: Play this condition only during a skirmish. Bearer must be a Hobbit. When this condition is played, wound a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.name: ·A Light in His Mind
card.text: Each time you lose initiative, you may spot 2 {Shire} companions to remove a burden.

card.name: Make Haste
card.text: Stealth. Spot a {Shire} companion and return him or her to your hand to make a Shadow player choose to remove {2} or discard a minion.

card.name: A Marvel
card.text: Exert a Hobbit to make another Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: Narrow Escape
card.text: Spot 2 Hobbit companions to make a Shadow player discard a minion (or spot 4 Hobbit companions to make that player discard 2 minions).

card.name: Nine-fingered Frodo and the Ring of Doom
card.text: Tale. Exert a {Shire} character to remove a burden or 2 threats.

card.name: Orc Armor
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Each Orc and each Uruk-hai skirmishing bearer is strength -1.

card.name: Shadowplay
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Shire} companions. Each time a minion is played, you may exert a Hobbit companion to exert that minion (limit once per turn).

card.name: Slunk Out of Sight
card.text: Stealth. If there are 6 or more {Shire} cards in your discard pile, cancel a skirmish involving your Hobbit and a minion who is not fierce. Each minion in that skirmish is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·The Tale of the Great Ring
card.text: Tale. Skirmish: Prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless a Shadow event is (or was) played during this skirmish. Discard this condition.

card.name: Base of Mindolluin
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: If you cannot spot 2 threats, add a threat to play a fortification from your draw deck.

card.name: Pelennor Prairie
card.text: Plains. Shadow: Exert a minion and remove a burden to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions.

card.name: Steward's Tomb
card.text: Wounds cannot be prevented or healed. Burdens cannot be removed.

card.name: Watchers of Cirith Ungol
card.text: Skirmish: Spot your {Ringwraith} Orc and remove 2 threats to make that {Ringwraith} Orc strength +3.

card.name: ·Frodo, Resolute Hobbit
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 12).

card.name: ·Sam, Great Elf Warrior
card.text: Ring-bound. Sam is strength +1 for each {Shire} companion you can spot. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).
